detail_desc: Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Pull-on trousers in double-weave slub cotton with an elasticated decorative drawstring waist and patch front pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured jersey with straps that have decorative knots at the front and cross at the back and can be adjusted with buttons. Elastication at the back of the waist, concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-2Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Long dress in softly draping duchesse with a slight sheen. Detachable, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a corset body with boning at the front, back and sides and a silicone trim at the top to help the dress stay in place. V-neck opening at the front with support panels to help it stay in shape. Internal wide fastening in mesh with an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening for an extra-good fit. Concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, gathered seams at the waist and on the skirt, and an asymmetric hem with a train. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured knit.
Calf-length skirt in a fine knit containing some wool. High waist with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair and wool blend with a rib-trimmed V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, slit at the front, and raw-edge hem.
Suede ankle boots with a decorative knot at one side and concealed zip in the other. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Two-strand necklace in different designs of metal chains. One is slightly longer. Adjustable length, 35.5-43.5 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, kangaroo pocket and long, raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Contrasting colour drawstring at the collar and cuffs.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.

Dress in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, gathered yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Press-stud on one shoulder.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a boat neck and buttons on the shoulders.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with buttons down the front, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short jacket in soft imitation suede with wide lapels, a loose yoke front and back, side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in silk crêpe with a V-neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, covered buttons at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed, boxy fit with dropped shoulders.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter 3.5 cm, 4.5 cm and 5.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication, a bow and frill trim at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps, front and back pockets and slim legs.
Brazilian briefs in soft microfibre with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Sleeveless top in pleated jersey with a frilled collar, opening with shiny buttons at the back of the neck, short butterfly sleeves with overlocked edges and a laser-cut hem.

Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets and buttons at the sides. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Kangol x H&M. A pair of scrunchies in a soft weave.
Fine-knit tube scarf in fluffy yarn containing glittery threads. Width 25 cm, circumference 55 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Shorts in a crêpe weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Short dress in lace with a small, pompom trimmed stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Seam at the waist with a lace trim, a concealed zip in one side, and raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Mesh court shoes with pointed toes and an elasticated top edge. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton with a hood, diagonal zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Braided elastic waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width approx. 7 cm.

Small handbag in imitation suede with a shoulder strap in metal chain and imitation leather, flap with a magnetic closure and decorative fastener, one outer compartment and an inner compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Cotton chambray skirt with smocking at the waist and tiers with overlocked edges. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and elastication and a flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and short sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow elastic straps that cross at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes and a lace trim at the hem.
Short velvet dress with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud. 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight tunic in denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck, pin-tucks around the neckline and armholes, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons and broderie anglaise frills at the top, short, butterfly sleeves and a gathered yoke at the front.
Narrow tie in satin with jacquard-weave spots. Width 5.5 cm.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with seams, decorative stitching and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in imitation suede and imitation leather with decorative zips at the front and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short slits in the sides.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Block-coloured swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist, lined front and elasticated hems.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket, lace details on the shoulders, a chest pocket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Jersey T-shirt and knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, covered elastication at the cuffs and hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Lined. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit with a fleece lining.
Body in soft jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Visible seams and ribbed sections at the sides, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a smocked panel at the top and bottom and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 45x160 cm.
